name: Come see the meteor shower
description:
Small game developed for the narrative game jam of June 2021.

You were in a vacation to do some camping, hunting and see the meteor shower along with your mom, dad and your little sister! Everything is wonderfull and there is so many thing tos do!! It's son fun! And indeed it was until the night of the meteor shower, then everything changed. 

WASD to move. 
Mouse to aim.
Space and F to interact.
